headline: 3 Reasons to Avoid AMC Stock and 1 Rival to Buy Instead
summary: Is the AMC rollercoaster finally over? Here's what you need to know about this fallen giant.

headline: DBS Raises Netflix (NFLX) Target Price on Subscriber Momentum, Maintains Buy
summary: Netflix Inc. (NASDAQ:NFLX) is one of the 10 best tech stocks to buy according to billionaires right now. On Tuesday, June 10, media portal ‘Deadline Hollywood’ reported that Netflix’s Co-CEO Ted Sarandos has committed to invest around $1.0 billion on content creation in Spain by 2029. Sarandos, speaking at Netflix’s Tres Cantos Madrid hub, highlighted the strong […]
